snippet: With the United States national team set to take on Canada Sunday night at Toronto's BMO Field, midfielder Michael Bradley is anxious to get back onto the field after Wednesday's 4-1 loss to Brazil.
abstract: With the United States national team set to take on Canada Sunday night at Toronto's BMO Field, midfielder Michael Bradley is anxious to get back onto the field after Wednesday's 4-1 loss to Brazil.

headline.main: With Eye on Qualifying, Michael Bradley Is Eager to Get Back to Work
